item.title: Shanghai Knights (2003) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: After a Chinese father is murdered and a treasure is stolen, two Chinese siblings and a friend travel to London in search of the sacred treasure and stop the evil that threatens the city and get justice for the father, and continue the legacy that he left behind.

item.title: Notting Hill (1999) Open Matte WEB-DL 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Every man's dream comes true for William Thacker, an unsuccessful Notting Hill bookstore owner, when Anna Scott, the world's most beautiful woman and best-liked actress, enters his shop. A little later, he still can't believe it himself, William runs into her again - this time spilling orange juice over her.

item.title: Mahavatar Narsimha (2024) NF WEB-DL 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Hiranyaksha and Hiranyakashipu are two demon brothers who want to conquer Swarglok,Dhartilok and Paatalok with their immense power.Hiranyaksha kidnaps Budhdevi shocking the world but Lord Vishnu sends his divine boar who in fierce battle kills Hiranyaksha and frees Bhudevi.

item.title: Jab Tak Hai Jaan (2012) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: An uncompromising film on true love from the legendary and unforgettable director Yash Chopra which is fascinatingly distinctive and contemporary.

item.title: Isle of Dogs (2018) BluRay 480p, 720p, 1080p & 2160p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: An outbreak of dog flu has spread through the city of Megasaki, Japan, and Mayor Kobayashi has demanded all dogs to be sent to Trash Island. On the island, a young boy named Atari sets out to find his lost dog, Spots, with the help of five other dogs... with many obstacles along the way.

item.title: Invincible Swordsman (2025) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Linghu Chong, who wants to quit the martial arts world, is forced to get involved in the turmoil of good and evil in the martial arts world. He unexpectedly meets the leader of the demon cult, Dongfang Bubai, and thus begins a journey to the world of cultivation together.

item.title: Himeanole (2016) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Getting two stories in one, HimeanÃ´ru depicts the story of co-workers where one of them is gunning to make a cafe's waitress his. When the co-worker visits the said cafe to see the waitress his friend is yearning for, he also meets an old class-mate he has not seen in some time.

item.title: The Assassin (2015) EXTENDED BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: In 8th century China, 10-year-old general's daughter Nie Yinniang is handed over to a nun who initiates her into the martial arts, transforming her into an exceptional assassin charged with eliminating cruel and corrupt local governors.

item.title: Body and Soul (1947) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Charley Davis wins an amateur boxing match and is taken on by promoter Quinn. Charley's mother doesn't want him to fight, but when Charley's father is accidentally killed, Charley sets up a fight for money.

item.title: All Is Lost (2013) BluRay 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Deep into a solo voyage in the Indian Ocean, an unnamed man (Redford) wakes to find his 39-foot yacht taking on water after a collision with a shipping container left floating on the high seas. With his navigation equipment and radio disabled, the man sails unknowingly into the path of a violent storm.

item.title: The Man in My Basement (2025) WEB-DL 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Charles Blakey, an African American man living in Sag Harbor, is stuck in a rut, out of luck and about to lose his ancestral home when a peculiar white businessman with a European accent offers to rent his basement for the summer.

item.title: Mantis (2025) NF WEB-DL 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: Mantis, an ace assassin, returns to the contract killer industry after a hiatus, encountering his trainee friend Jae-yi and a retired legendary killer Dok-go, who now runs the organization.

item.title: All of You (2025) WEB-DL 480p, 720p & 1080p
item.dc:creator: Saaya
item.description: A stirring near-futuristic romance of two best friends who harbor an unspoken love for one another even after a test matches one of them up with their supposed soulmate.

item.title: Outlander: Blood of My Blood Season 1 WEB-DL [Episode 9 Added]
item.dc:creator: BHB
item.description: "Outlander: Blood of My Blood" is a romantic saga that unfolds across time. From the battlefields of World War I to the rugged Highlands of 18th century Scotland, two fated couples must defy the forces that seek to tear them apart, intersecting in surprising and unforeseen ways.

item.title: Invasion Season 3 WEB-DL [Episode 6 Added]
item.dc:creator: BHB
item.description: Earth is visited by an alien species that threatens humanity's existence. Events unfold in real time through the eyes of five ordinary people across the globe as they struggle to make sense of the chaos unravelling around them.

item.title: Peacemaker Season 2 WEB-DL [Episode 6 Added]
item.dc:creator: BHB
item.description: After recovering from his injures, Christopher Smith is forced to join a black ops squad and eliminate parasites that have taken over human bodies around the world.
